unnormalised: Arre yaar, Virar local sodanch late asta! Schedule-an 6:15 AM sharp bhair sorta mhunta, punn ti sadharon 6:30 AM vo even 6:45 AM-ak disti poddta. Ani Thane-an than Dadar-ak peak hours-anim zaata tea traffic-ache vixayan uloi naka mhaka, sahajponan 2 voram lagtat! Bangalore-ak flight asa 22/12-ak, 8 PM bhair sorta, borem zalear, atam tori delay zanvcho nhoi.
normalised: Arre yaar, Virarchi local sodanch late asta! Schedule-an so dislem mhonnlear six fifteen A M sharp start zatat, punn ti generally six thirty A M vo even six forty five A M poriant dista. Ani Thane thaun Dadar peak hours-antlean traffic-achi koxi asat ti sangonkuch naka, easyli don voram lagtat! Flight Bangalore-k twenty second December-ak asa, departing eight P M, umed asa, hea pavtim delay nasum.
